job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a forward-thinking developer eager to harness the power of GenAI to redefine business standards and enhance productivity? Are you bored of solving the same customer support tickets or resolving the same bugs over and over again?, * Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_details.full_text:
Support Engineer, IgniteTech (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Are you a forward-thinking developer eager to harness the power of GenAI to redefine business standards and enhance productivity? Are you bored of solving the same customer support tickets or resolving the same bugs over and over again?, * Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs. This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets. One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
     * Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, while providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
     * Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS, and ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction., * Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development, fine-tuning, and deployment of applications built on large language models (LLMs) and other generative AI technologies. Key responsibilities include creating autonomous support platforms using LLMs, integrating state-of-the-art AI like GPT-4 Vision, and enhancing AI solution performance. This aligns directly with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and maintaining production-grade user-facing systems and leveraging LLM frameworks.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs' directly relates to building and adapting generative models for specific tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets' describes the process of building and maintaining software applications, including user-facing elements and integration.
job_tasks.phrase: development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process' describes the development of a user-facing application or feature.
job_tasks.phrase: creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision' involves working with and evaluating advanced generative AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows' indicates understanding how AI can be applied to business processes and guiding others on its use.
job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures' involves assessing and improving the functionality and deployment of AI-powered systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction' relates to the operational aspects of keeping AI solutions running and ensuring user satisfaction, which is part of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality' highlights the alignment of technical work with business goals of improving services and innovation.
job_tasks.phrase: Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
